title: Would just like to say TY, @Riot
body:
{{champion:76}}  patch 6.14-6.15 overall winrates

bronze  44 -->46%
silver  46 --> 47%
gold 47 -->48%
plat 49 --> 50%
diamond + 54 --> 51%

as a Nidalee main... i would like to say.. well done

you are almost there

replies.body:
I just want S3 {{champion:76}} back

I have 3 of her skins for nothing

> [{quoted}](name=Caítlyn,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=fE3w6fsP,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-08-04T00:15:31.731+0000)
>
> I just want S3 {{champion:76}} back
> 
> I have 3 of her skins for nothing

Fire and forget spear gameplay was boring and toxic.

> [{quoted}](name=Caítlyn,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=fE3w6fsP,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-08-04T00:15:31.731+0000)
>
> I just want S3 {{champion:76}} back
> 
> I have 3 of her skins for nothing

no... season 4 nidalee was the best.. after her rework she was MUCH more fun to play

The "rework" is another name for "massive nerf"

I miss my spears hitbox and damage

I miss armor + mr in cat mode

I miss my traps countering {{champion:17}}shrooms and {{champion:35}} boxes

I miss Pounce cd going down with cdr

I even miss the old Pounce direction - I fail jumping over walls so many times because it goes toward the cursor - like why? so noobs can play her?

> [{quoted}](name=Caítlyn,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=fE3w6fsP,comment-id=000100010000,timestamp=2016-08-04T00:44:24.410+0000)
>
> The "rework" is another name for "massive nerf"
> 
> I miss my spears hitbox and damage
> 
> I miss armor + mr in cat mode
> 
> I miss my traps countering {{champion:17}}shrooms and {{champion:35}} boxes
> 
> I miss Pounce cd going down with cdr
> 
> I even miss the old Pounce direction - I fail jumping over walls so many times because it goes toward the cursor - like why? so noobs can play her?

it wasn't a "massive nerf"
it gave her counterplay where she had none and it crazy buffed her lvls 1-6 because of kitty form made available at lvl 1.

plus it made her MUCH more fun.

Almost if not there. 
now for the azir rework
